channel.title: RIZEs on NEP

item.title: RIZE
item.description: We are still working in this documentation page Last update 22/03/2018 RIZE (Robot Interface from Zero Experience) is Google Blockly and web-based programming interface. Its mainly oriented to work with heterogeneous and multi-robot systems. RIZE was designed to enable an easy addition of new robots, sensory devices and human behavior understanding algorithms. The main idea of RIZE is reduce the effort that requires robot development for both end-users and expert programmers using automatic code generation tools.
